titles.title: Bless The Lord O My Soul

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bless the Lord, oh my soul, Bless the Lord, oh my soul, And all that is within me Bless His holy name!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For He has done great things (Hallelujah) He has done great things (Hallelujah) He has done great things Bless His holy name!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
